name: San Mateo 101 Express Lanes Go Card
description: Discounted tolls on US-101 Express Lanes for income-eligible drivers
fullDescription: The San Mateo 101 Express Lanes equity program provides discounted tolls for low-income drivers using the US-101 express lanes in San Mateo County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Significant toll discounts for eligible drivers
- Valid on US-101 Express Lanes in San Mateo County
- Helps lower-income commuters access express lanes
- Works with FasTrak toll tag
howToGetIt:
1. Must meet income eligibility requirements
2. Apply online at 101expresslanes.org
3. Provide proof of income
4. Receive toll discount on eligible trips
keywords: express lanes, 101, toll discount, San Mateo, FasTrak, low-income, equity program, Go Card, Peninsula
